settings.description: Configure the commerce plugin behaviour and customise the data model.

general.title: Store preferences
general.description: Default currency and checkout options used across the storefront.

productFields.title: Product custom fields
productFields.description: Extend the default product schema with additional attributes.

addressFields.title: Customer address fields
addressFields.description: Capture extra information for billing and shipping addresses.

defaultCurrency.label: Default currency
defaultCurrency.description: Used as the pre-filled currency when creating new products.

allowGuestCheckout.label: Guest checkout
allowGuestCheckout.title: Allow guest checkout
allowGuestCheckout.description: Let customers place orders without creating an account.

taxInclusivePricing.label: Tax inclusive pricing
taxInclusivePricing.title: Prices include taxes
taxInclusivePricing.description: Display product prices including taxes by default.

products.pageDescription: Manage your catalogue, pricing and availability.

emptyState.title: No products yet
emptyState.description: Start building your catalogue by creating your first product.

details.title: Product details
details.description: Review the product configuration and localisation.
details.noSummary: No summary available for this language.

create.title: Create product
create.description: The visual editor for products will be available soon.
create.helper: In the meantime you can create products via the API or integrate your own editor interface.

orders.pageDescription: Track fulfilment, payments and customer information.

emptyState.title: No orders yet
emptyState.description: Orders will appear here as soon as customers start buying.

details.title: Order {{number}}
details.description: Overview of the order timeline and totals.
